title: The Return of Sports
itunes:title: The Return of Sports
description:
Noel LaMontagne, Client Relationship Manager at Verdence Capital Advisors, discusses the return of sports. He also talks about the need for education, knowledge and resiliency during this time.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Jason Kelly. Producer: Doni Holloway.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
